hostname dev3
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 ip address 10.23.0.3 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 ip address 10.34.0.3 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
!
router ospf 300
 router-id 10.99.3.3
 network 10.23.0.0 0.0.0.255 area 0.0.0.0
 network 10.34.0.0 0.0.0.255 area 0.0.0.0
!
router bgp 300
 bgp router-id 10.99.3.3
 neighbor 10.23.0.2 remote-as 300
 neighbor 10.23.0.2 route-reflector-client
 neighbor 10.34.0.4 remote-as 300
 neighbor 10.34.0.4 route-reflector-client
!
end
